alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 09 at 2:18AM MST until March 11 at 8:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible with locally higher amounts upwards of 30 inches generally above 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
